fr.epita.iam.services.dao

Class IdentityDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.epita.iam.services.dao.IdentityDAO

  • public class IdentityDAO
extends java.lang.Object

    Description

    This IdentityDAO class is used to manage the identities persisted in the database (more concretely: Create, Search, Delete and Update operations). IdentityDAO interacts with the DataBase and has four different public methods:

    void create(Identity identity)

    void delete(Identity identity)

    List Identity searchAll(Identity criteria)

    void update(Identity identity)

    Identity searchById(int id)

    Author:
    Stéfano Acosta - Álvaro Bilbao

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create(Identity identity)
      Description Creates an identity and persist it in a database, the identity can be null, partially set or completely set.
      void delete(Identity identity)
      Description Deletes an identity from a database by using the Id from the identity.
      java.util.List<Identity> searchAll(Identity criteria)
      Description Read all the identities from the database, in returns a List of Identities.
      Identity searchById(int id)
      Description Read an identity from the database by looking by Id field identity.getId(), so a searchAll shall be ran first to obtain the Id.
      void update(Identity identity)
      Description Update a given identity in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(Identity identity)
            throws IdentityCreationException

        Description

        Creates an identity and persist it in a database, the identity can be null, partially set or completely set.

        Parameters:
        identity -
        Throws:
        IdentityCreationException

      • delete

        public void delete(Identity identity)
            throws IdentityDeletionException

        Description

        Deletes an identity from a database by using the Id from the identity. In order to be able to use the Id field identity.getId(), a search should be done first to retrieve the Id index from the databases.

        Parameters:
        identity -
        Throws:
        IdentityDeletionException

      • searchAll

        public java.util.List<Identity> searchAll(Identity criteria)
                                   throws IdentitySearchException

        Description

        Read all the identities from the database, in returns a List of Identities.

        Returns:
        results , as a Identity List with Identities with Ids set.
        Throws:
        IdentitySearchException

      • update

        public void update(Identity identity)
            throws IdentityUpdateException

        Description

        Update a given identity in the database. In order to be able to use the Id field identity.getId(), a search should be done first to retrieve the Id index from the databases.

        Parameters:
        identity -
        Throws:
        IdentityUpdateException

      • searchById

        public Identity searchById(int id)
                    throws IdentitySearchException

        Description

        Read an identity from the database by looking by Id field identity.getId(), so a searchAll shall be ran first to obtain the Id.

        Parameters:
        id - integer field
        Returns:
        identity
        Throws:
        IdentitySearchException
